name: Pareidolia (Lucidum Studio)
description:
It`s night. A distant light can be seen crashing to earth. The worlds armies mobilize to the crash site. It`s a UFO.  Is the world on the brink of an alien invation?  What is the aliens intentions? 

This third person hybrid strategy and adventure game places the player in control of an alien protagonist.

This is currently in closed alpha development.
